alert.note: Alert for Arkansas; Cleveland; Jefferson; Lonoke (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 12:46AM CDT until June 14 at 1:30AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Cleveland County in southeastern Arkansas... Southern Lonoke County in central Arkansas... Central Jefferson County in southeastern Arkansas... Northwestern Arkansas County in southeastern Arkansas... * Until 130 AM CDT. * At 1246 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Pine Bluff, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Pine Bluff... White Hall... Altheimer... Humphrey... Warbritton... Cottondale... Linwood... Richardson... Madding... Pine Bluff Arsenal... Sulphur Springs... Wabbaseka... Sherrill... Gethsemane... Cornerstone... Faith... Pinebergen... Moscow... Ladd... Bayou Meteo State Game Area... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
